summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Multi-member Invoice Creation and Advanced Member Filtering features. All 8 features tested and working correctly (100% pass rate).

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

Filter dropdowns correctly filter the member list in real-time
CSV download includes all relevant member data with proper headers
Select All and Select Without Unpaid buttons work correctly
Create button dynamically shows count of selected members
